document_data.name: Tranzig
document_data.mainbody: '''Tranzig''' was an [[Iron Throne]] operative during the time of the [[iron crisis]] of [[1368 DR]]. He acted as messenger between [[Tazok]] and [[Mulahey]].
document_data.Activities: Being the messenger between Mulahey and Tazok, Tranzig often traveled between the [[Nashkel mine]] to either [[Peldvale]] or [[Larswood]] in the [[Wood of Sharp Teeth]]. His superiors paid him well for his discretion.
document_data.Possessions: The [[mage]] owned one of the ''[[ring of the princes]]'' and carried with him a ''[[wand of magic missiles]]''.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, he ''[[petrified]]'' the [[cleric]] [[Branwen]] during a caravan raid.
